text: John Edmund C. Brooks is an English football referee. He referees for the Premier League. Brooks was promoted in June 2021. Before this, he was a Select Group Referee and a Premier League assistant referee. In December 2021, Brooks refereed his first Premier League match. The match was between Wolves and Burnley at The Molineux Stadium. == References == Category:1990 births Category:living people Category:English football referees Category:Sportspeople from Leicestershire
title: John Brooks (referee)
